video_prompt: A brilliant, glowing light radiates downward, illuminating a vibrant, transitioning lotus whose shimmering tendrils of mist dynamically extend outwards. A golden, spiraling structure descends from the lotus, encircling a light-emitting orb hovering above swirling water, creating concentric rings of light. Luminous blue energy columns rise, connecting the orb to the lotus, all set against a subtly shifting, mystical mountain twilight.
image_prompt:
Remove the watermark.

**Prompt:** Mystical artwork combining organic and cosmic elements. A brilliant, glowing light at the top radiates celestial energy, spilling onto a magnificent lotus flower. The lotus has vibrant, color-shifting petals (yellows/oranges to purples/blues/reds), outlined in shimmering gold. Wispy, glowing mist (red/blue) extends from the flower. Below, a golden spiraling structure descends from the lotus, encircling a glowing, jewel-like orb hovering above swirling water, reflecting intense light in oranges and blues with concentric rings. Ancient script patterns are etched into the golden spiral. Luminous blue energy columns connect the orb to the lotus. The background features serene, snow-capped mountains in a hazy mist against a starlit twilight sky with flowing light streaks. Overall atmosphere is profound tranquility and spiritual enlightenment, evoking ancient wisdom and cosmic energy.
refined_video_prompt: A brilliant light radiates downwards, dynamically illuminating a transitioning lotus. Shimmering mist tendrils extend outwards. A golden spiral descends, encircling a hovering orb. Swirling water generates expanding concentric light rings. Luminous blue energy columns rise, linking the orb and lotus. The mystical mountain twilight subtly shifts and deepens.
